Plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.
Title: The Abyss
Actors: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Michael Biehn, Leo Burmester
tomatoConsensus: The utterly gorgeous special effects frequently overshadow the fact that The Abyss is also a totally gripping, claustrophobic thriller, complete with an interesting crew of characters.
